author: maxb
msg: Python bindings: Minor improvements.
* subversion/bindings/swig/python/svn/__init__.py:
(__all__): Add, to make 'from svn import *' work.
* subversion/bindings/swig/python/svn/*.py
(header comments): Standardize the format.

author: maxb
msg: mailer.py: Fix issue #1262 - filtering of changed-paths in reports.
Adds a new option excluded_paths, which specifies the action to take for
changed-paths in a commit which do not match the for_paths regexp.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py (Commit.__init__): Record the paths
associated with each group/params profile.
(Commit.generate): Retreive the paths and pass to generate_content().
(generate_content): Use the paths dict, and the new option value, to control
the generated content.
(_select_adds, _select_deletes, _select_modifies): Deleted, only user
refactored to use lambda functions instead.
(generate_list): Revise the interface, and add path-filtering capability.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.conf.example: Document the new
excluded_paths option.

author: maxb
msg: Commit merge of r12499 and r12542 to backport branch.

author: maxb
msg: Create backport branch for win32 mailer.py compatibility fixes.

author: maxb
msg: mailer.py: Followup changes, fixing some bugs in the Win32 compatibility code,
and also return to passing the stderr of diff programs into the email.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py: Improve the Popen3 compat class, and add
a Popen4 version.
(OutputBase.run): Use Popen4, not Popen3.
